Analysis Projects

This page contains links to my data analysis projects, each with its own dedicated GitHub repository. Each project includes detailed documentation, code, and results.

Current Projects

COVID-19 Survival Analysis

Analyze hospital length of stay and mortality outcomes using survival analysis methods including Kaplan-Meier estimates, Cox proportional hazards models, parametric survival models, and mixed-effects approaches.

R Survival Analysis Mixed-Effects Models

Statistical Methods
